o: lens.Lens(lambda filename: open(filename).read(), lambda filename, new: open(filename, 'w').write(new))
lens.Iso(lambda dicts: [list(dicts[0].keys())] + [list(row.values()) for row in dicts], lambda lists: [dict(zip(lists[0], row)) for row in lists][1:])
lens.Iso(lambda yx: (yx[0], yx[1]//28), lambda yx: (yx[0], yx[1]*28))
